List of priors

Source: R/prior-class.R
Prior.Rd

List of priors

List of priors

Public fields

sigma_loc

\(\sigma_{loc}\) ~ gamma(sigma_loc[1], sigma_loc[2])

sigma_scale

\(\sigma_{scale}\) ~ gamma(sigma_scale[1], sigma_scale[2])

gamma_loc

\(\gamma_{loc}\) ~ normal(0, gamma_loc[2])

gamma_scale

\(\gamma_{scale}\) ~ gamma(gamma_scale[1], gamma_scale[2])

kappa_loc

\(\kappa_{loc}\) ~ gamma(kappa_loc[1], kappa_loc[2])

kappa_scale

\(\kappa_{scale}\) ~ gamma(kappa_scale[1], kappa_scale[2])

alpha_loc

\(\alpha_{loc}\) ~ normal(alpha_loc[1], alpha_loc[2])

alpha_scale

\(\alpha_{scale}\) ~ gamma(alpha_scale[1], alpha_scale[2])

ntfp_loc

\(ntfp_{loc}\) ~ normal(ntfp_loc[1], ntfp_loc[2])

ntfp_scale

\(ntfp_{scale}\) ~ gamma(ntfp_scale[1], ntfp_scale[2])

Methods

Public methods

  • Prior$new()

  • Prior$as_list()

  • Prior$clone()

Method new()

Create a new Model object. All values must be greater than 0.

Usage

Prior$new(
  sigma_loc = c(2, 1/2),
  sigma_scale = c(2, 1/2),
  gamma_loc = 5,
  gamma_scale = c(2, 1/20),
  kappa_loc = c(3, 1),
  kappa_scale = c(3, 1),
  alpha_loc = c(0, 5),
  alpha_scale = c(2, 1/2),
  ntfp_loc = 0.5,
  ntfp_scale = c(2, 3)
)

Arguments

sigma_loc

vector of length 2

sigma_scale

vector of length 2

gamma_loc

real

gamma_scale

vector of length 2

kappa_loc

vector of length 2

kappa_scale

vector of length 2

alpha_loc

vector of length 2

alpha_scale

vector of length 2

ntfp_loc

real

ntfp_scale

vector of length 2

Returns

A new Prior object.

Method as_list()

Convert object to a list. This is useful when passing data to Stan

Usage

Prior$as_list()

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Prior$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
